ygData.subject: Re: Skull of Jhen Tra (how to use it **Spoiler**)
ygData.msgSnippet: They used to NOT disappear.  I had about 10 of them a tone time (during commercial release).  I think since it is part of a quest, they only want you to get
ygData.messageBody:
They used to NOT disappear. I had about 10 of them a tone time (during
commercial release). I think since it is part of a quest, they only want
you to get one at a time.

- Ziff

-----Original Message-----
From: Robert Spelman [mailto:madoc_ab_owain@...]
Sent: Friday, May 07, 1999 7:13 PM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Skull of Jhen Tra (how to use it **Spoiler**)


From: "Robert Spelman" <madoc_ab_owain@...>

You say the Skull is a lore item, and that you can only ever have one of
them in inventory? This would go along with the items carried by the bandit
sisters in Lesser Faydark. They sometimes have pearl necklaces, non-magical
but are listed as lore items. These necklaces also disappear if you already
have one in your inventory. Could we draw the conclusion that all lore items

are considered to be "unique" for any given PC?

Vash, 11th Level Wizardess, Felwithe, E'ci
